RootsFinder - Several visualizations

d3.js

Several visualizations created for rootsFinder

1. Genealogy bar

It visualizes genealogy similarity between two genes

2. Converted sunburst to d3.v4

3. Created force simulation graph

With zoom, pan and node selection support

Occamlabs - Interactive Map

mapbox, deck.gl, d3.js, bootstrap, sass, webpack

Details

This map uses mapbox for background layers and deck.gl’s HexagonLayer layer to display impressive 3D bars on top of mapbox

Project is live already and we can see it online on Nestseekers site.

You can click on top KPI’s to display other information’s

Hover over the bars, to reveal additional insights

Continent insights

City insights

By clicking the city, we can show detailed view of map, where more thank 50K + points are displayed

Where we can filter by category, price, see the details of each point and e.t.c

If we zoom detailed enough, we even can see 3D buildings

Image gallery

© 2018 David B.
ha ha ha
